topics.body:
He lusted after that fiend. T.F knew it was wrong. If the townsfolk had found out about his desires for the fiend, they strap rocks to his feet and throw him into the bottom of the nearest lake. They hated that fiend; once every month it would come into the village; raping the male livestock, men, and anything else that only had a dick.

T.O was never raped by this fiend before. His lust for the thing was so strong that he even had sewn together a cow costume. He had sat in the pasture, waiting for the fiend to satisfy his carnal desires. He never did, T.O was a hermpahrodite.

"@Carcass Strife":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5537146c63687261cc140300#post_5537146c63687261cc140300
Damned if I do, damned if I don't.

If I stop now, EHAN and the Nichijou fanboys will come for me. If I continue, I may end up breaking and become a dedicated fan like them, or suffer from another 18-19 episodes of animated boredom. _And after sitting though about 7-8 of them already, I'm not that impressed._

EHAN, I love you bro, but god this anime is a bore.

topics.body:
And to be honest, I kind of want to like Nichijou.

*But I can't.*

I feel nothing for this show. The characters. The animation. The humor. The references. The pacing. The stories. The music..._okay I actually kinda do like the intro and closing themes for this show._

But about 90-95% of the show just doesn't do it for me.
topics.author: 536f7a11636872666e2d0000
